channel.title: Canvas on Software Engineer made in Wales but working in Germany - Danny Croft

item.title: HTML5 Canvas - Fireworks
item.description: After finally getting some free time (Christmas Eve). I decided to action some of the items I learnt at the Full Frontal conference in November. I’ve tested the demo in: (in order of performance) Safari 5.0.3 Chrome 8.0.552 Firefox 3.6.13 Opera 10.10 Here’s what I came up with:Â http://bit.ly/gRYQkt You can download all the source files here: http://bit.ly/gUPpxI
